verses.verse: The word<WH1697> that came to Jeremiah<WH3414> concerning all the people<WH5971> of Judah<WH3063>, in the fourth<WH7243> year<WH8141> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah<WH2977>, king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> (the same was the first<WH7224> year<WH8141> of Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>,)
which Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> spake<WH1696> unto all the people<WH5971> of Judah<WH3063>, and to all the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, saying<WH559>:

From the thirteenth<WH7969> year<WH8141> of Josiah<WH2977> the son<WH1121> of Amon<WH526>, king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, even unto this day<WH3117>, these three<WH7969> and twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141>, the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> hath come unto me<WH1696>, and I have spoken unto you<WH7925>, rising up early and speaking<WH1696>; but ye have not hearkened<WH8085>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> hath sent<WH7971> unto you all his servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>, rising up early<WH7925> and sending<WH7971> them<WH8085>, (but ye have not hearkened, nor inclined<WH5186> your ear<WH241> to hear<WH8085>,)

saying <WH559>, Return<WH7725> ye now every one<WH376> from his evil<WH7451> way<WH1870>, and from the evil<WH7455> of your doings<WH4611>, and dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH127> that Jehovah<WH3068> hath given<WH5414> unto you and to your fathers<WH1>, from of old and even<WH5769> for<WH5704> evermore<WH5769>;

and go<WH3212> not after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to serve<WH5647> them<WH7812>, and to worship them<WH3707>, and provoke me not to anger with the work<WH4639> of your hands<WH3027>; and I will do you no hurt<WH7489>.
Yet ye have not hearkened<WH8085> unto me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>; that ye may provoke me to anger<WH3707> with the work<WH4639> of your hands<WH3027> to your own hurt<WH7451>.
Therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: Because ye have not heard<WH8085> my words<WH1697>,

behold <WH7971>, I will send and take<WH3947> all the families<WH4940> of the north<WH6828>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, and I will send unto Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, my servant<WH5650>, and will bring<WH935> them against this land<WH776>, and against the inhabitants<WH3427> thereof<WH1471>, and against all these nations round about<WH5439>; and I will utterly destroy<WH2763> them<WH7760>, and make them an astonishment<WH8047>, and a hissing<WH8322>, and perpetual<WH5769> desolations<WH2723>.

Moreover I will take<WH6> from them the voice<WH6963> of mirth<WH8342> and the voice<WH6963> of gladness<WH8057>, the voice<WH6963> of the bridegroom<WH2860> and the voice<WH6963> of the bride<WH3618>, the sound<WH6963> of the millstones<WH7347>, and the light<WH216> of the lamp<WH5216>.
And this whole land<WH776> shall be a desolation<WH2723>, and an astonishment<WH8047>; and these nations<WH1471> shall serve<WH5647> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> seventy<WH7657> years<WH8141>.

And it shall come to pass<WH7657>, when seventy years<WH8141> are accomplished<WH4390>, that I will punish<WH6485> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and that nation<WH1471>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, for their iniquity<WH5771>, and the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans<WH3778>; and I will make<WH7760> it desolate<WH8077> for ever<WH5769>.

And I will bring<WH935> upon that land<WH776> all my words<WH1697> which I have pronounced<WH1696> against it<WH3789>, even all that is written in this book<WH5612>, which Jeremiah<WH3414> hath prophesied<WH5012> against all the nations<WH1471>.

For many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> and great<WH1419> kings<WH4428> shall make bondmen<WH5647> of them<WH7999>, even of them; and I will recompense them according to their deeds<WH6467>, and according to the work<WH4639> of their hands<WH3027>.

For thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, unto me<WH3947>: take this cup<WH3563> of the wine<WH3196> of wrath<WH2534> at my hand<WH3027>, and cause all the nations<WH1471>, to whom I send<WH7971> thee<WH8248>, to drink it.
And they shall drink<WH8354>, and reel<WH1607> to and fro<WH1984>, and be mad, because<WH6440> of the sword<WH2719> that I will send among them<WH7971>.
Then took<WH3947> I the cup<WH3563> at Jehovah<WH3068>'s hand<WH3027>, and made all the nations<WH1471> to drink<WH8248>, unto whom Jehovah<WH3068> had sent me<WH7971>:

to wit<WH3389>, Jerusalem, and the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063>, and the kings<WH4428> thereof<WH8269>, and the princes thereof<WH5414>, to make them a desolation<WH2723>, an astonishment<WH8047>, a hissing<WH8322>, and a curse<WH7045>, as it is this day<WH3117>;
Pharaoh <WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>, and his servants<WH5650>, and his princes<WH8269>, and all his people<WH5971>;

and all the mingled<WH6153> people<WH4428>, and all the kings of the land<WH776> of the Uz<WH5780>, and all the kings<WH4428> of the<WH776> Philistines<WH6430>, and Ashkelon<WH831>, and Gaza<WH5804>, and Ekron<WH6138>, and the remnant<WH7611> of Ashdod<WH795>;
Edom <WH123>, and Moab<WH4124>, and the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>;
and all the kings<WH4428> of Tyre<WH6865>, and all the kings<WH4428> of Sidon<WH6721>, and the kings<WH4428> of the isle<WH339> which is beyond<WH5676> the sea<WH3220>;
Dedan <WH1719>, and Tema<WH8485>, and Buz<WH938>, and all that have the corners<WH6285> of their hair cut off<WH7112>;
and all the kings<WH4428> of Arabia<WH6152>, and all the kings<WH4428> of the mingled people<WH6153> that dwell<WH7931> in the wilderness<WH4057>;
and all the kings<WH4428> of Zimri<WH2174>, and all the kings<WH4428> of Elam<WH5867>, and all the kings<WH4428> of the Medes<WH4074>;

and all the kings<WH4428> of the north<WH6828>, far<WH7350> and near<WH7138>, one<WH376> with another<WH251>; and all the kingdoms<WH4467> of the world<WH776>, which are upon the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>: and the king<WH4428> of Sheshach<WH8347> shall drink<WH8354> after them<WH310>.

And thou shalt say<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>: Drink<WH8354> ye<WH7937>, and be drunken, and spew<WH7006>, and fall<WH5307>, and rise<WH6965> no more<WH6440>, because of the sword<WH2719> which I will send among you<WH7971>.

And it shall be<WH3985>, if they refuse to take<WH3947> the cup<WH3563> at thy hand<WH3027> to drink<WH8354>, then shalt thou say<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: Ye shall surely<WH8354> drink<WH8354>.

For <WH2490>, lo, I begin to work evil<WH7489> at the city<WH5892> which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>; and should ye be utterly<WH5352> unpunished<WH5352>? Ye shall not be unpunished<WH5352>; for I will call<WH7121> for a sword<WH2719> upon all the inhabitants<WH3427> of the earth<WH776>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

Therefore prophesy<WH5012> thou against them all these words<WH1697>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH3068>, Jehovah will roar<WH7580> from on high<WH4791>, and utter<WH5414> his voice<WH6963> from his holy<WH6944> habitation<WH4583>; he will mightily<WH7580> roar<WH7580> against his fold<WH5116>; he will give<WH6030> a shout<WH1959>, as they that tread<WH1869> the grapes<WH3427>, against all the inhabitants of the earth<WH776>.

A noise<WH7588> shall come<WH935> even to the end<WH7097> of the earth<WH776>; for Jehovah<WH3068> hath a controversy<WH7379> with the nations<WH1471>; he will enter into judgment<WH8199> with all flesh<WH1320>: as for the wicked<WH7563>, he will give<WH5414> them to the sword<WH2719>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, Behold<WH7451>, evil shall go forth<WH3318> from nation<WH1471> to nation<WH1471>, and a great<WH1419> tempest<WH5591> shall be raised up<WH5782> from the uttermost parts<WH3411> of the earth<WH776>.

And the slain<WH2491> of Jehovah<WH3068> shall be at that day<WH3117> from one end<WH7097> of the earth<WH776> even unto the other end<WH7097> of the earth<WH776>: they shall not be lamented<WH5594>, neither gathered<WH622>, nor buried<WH6912>; they shall be dung<WH1828> upon<WH6440> the face of the ground<WH127>.

Wail <WH3213>, ye shepherds<WH7462>, and cry<WH2199>; and wallow<WH6428> in ashes<WH117>, ye principal of the flock<WH6629>; for the days<WH3117> of your slaughter<WH2873> and of your dispersions<WH8600> are fully come<WH4390>, and ye shall fall<WH5307> like a goodly<WH2532> vessel<WH3627>.
And the shepherds<WH7462> shall have no way<WH4498> to flee<WH6>, nor the principal<WH117> of the flock<WH6629> to escape<WH6413>.
A voice<WH6963> of the cry<WH6818> of the shepherds<WH7462>, and the wailing<WH3215> of the principal<WH117> of the flock<WH6629>! for Jehovah<WH3068> layeth waste<WH7703> their pasture<WH4830>.
And the peaceable<WH7965> folds<WH4999> are brought to silence<WH1826> because<WH6440> of the fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

He hath left<WH5800> his covert<WH5520>, as the lion<WH3715>; for their land<WH776> is become an astonishment<WH8047> because<WH6440> of the fierceness<WH2740> of the oppressing<WH3238> sword<WH6440>, and because of his fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639>.
